message.content:
I need to identify the net amount of cash and cash equivalents generated from investing activities, along with its component sub-items.

Looking at the cash flow statement, I can see the section "Cash Flow from Investing Activities" which includes:

1. Purchase of Fixed Assets: 85889.19
2. Net Cash Flow from Investing Activities: -85889.19

The net cash flow from investing activities is -85889.19, which represents a cash outflow. This makes sense because the company spent money to purchase fixed assets.

The only component sub-item contributing to this value is "Purchase of Fixed Assets" with a value of 85889.19 (positive number representing the expense amount).

So the final answer is:

```json
{"solution": {'value': '-85889.19', 'sub_items': {'sub_item value': '85889.19'}}}
```
